title: Golden Pearl Floral Grand Haaram
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features 7 South Sea Golden Pearls (Moti) weighing 128.12 carats. Accented with 60 multi-colored Sapphires and other precious stones weighing 56.34 carats.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases a meticulously crafted floral design. Each gold flower is pave-set with shimmering stones, creating a captivating sparkle. The lustrous Golden South Sea Pearls are strategically placed to highlight the neckline. The use of multi-colored stones adds a vibrant touch to the traditional design.
colors: complemented by a vibrant array of sapphire colors including blue
occasions: and other grand celebrations. An ideal piece for a bride's muhurtham or a seemantham ceremony. Also suited for high-end social events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Grand Haaram is a true masterpiece of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of 22K gold, South Sea pearls, and multi-colored gemstones creates a luxurious and unforgettable piece. Its bold design is sure to make a lasting impression.
